entry.title: Best Friend
entry.content:
Hello best friend, ironic ain’t it? I called a site as best friend, but that’s what I feel. I can’t share if I am not feeling fine with my family in Indo, otherwise they will be very worried, but if I share stuff with my family here they don’t believe me.

Now what hurts most is, when you tell someone you are not feeling fine, they’d say, it’s only on your head.

I try to believe that they are right, so live my days as they go. Bye.

entry.title: It obviously comes when it's colder?
entry.content:
Yeah two days ago, it was 18-23°c here in Germany, it was spring!

But since yesterday, the temperature dropped dramatically until 5°.

I got headache again :–( Though it was gone after I took Tomapiring but it is the same headache, the same location..

Plus I felt strange in my chest, sooooo tired feeling again..

So let’s hope it’s temporary..

entry.title: Nicee.....
entry.content: It’s just soooooooooooo nice to live our days when we are healthy. I am happy :-D

entry.title: Feel Sooo Tired
entry.content:
I don’t know what’s wrong with me, I feel so tired in the afternoon, after doing literally nothing.

Morning, taking my little darling to Kindergarten, go home, cleaning the house a bit not the hard tasks, pick her up again, prepare lunch, eat our lunch, clean the dishes, and now hardly can do anything because of tired feeling.

I want to check, but will they believe me? It was a Brain Tumor suspicion and now Heart disease suspicion, they’ll think I am crazy, making it up.

But no, I don’t, I feel there is something wrong with me.

entry.title: Life is Just Amazing - Be Happy
entry.content:
When you wake up, sun shines, bird sings, you are feeling HEALTHY, what else do you want? This is my life when I have no headache or just the sign of it.

Happily grilling and having a meal with my family, I want nothing else.

Yeah, it may nothing to some, but to be healthy and be with my family is everything to me. As simple as that. G’night.

entry.title: Two Days No Headache - Endings
entry.content:
Since I got two worst headache two or three days ago, I didn’t even feel something on my head in the last two days, it was a bliss.

However, today, I felt slightly terrible headache for a few seconds infront of computer.

I did neck-gym 20 times, seems to be better, but I don’t want to have this kind of headache again, please not this one..

entry.title: It Comes After Meals
entry.content:
This two worst headaches that happened yesterday, I noticed it always came after meals. The first one came right after lunch, I was even still on my dinning chair.

The second one happened right after my dinner.

Sounds hard to believe but this headache is the one that happened in summer last year, when I called my mom in law to come over.

God, I hope it won’t come again…

It sounds crazy, but I told my husband to sue my first doc if it is a BT.

entry.title: Worst Headache of Mine
entry.content:
While I am having lunch today, I have worst headache ever, it was like 5-6 seconds on my forehead, but when it happened, It hurt so much that I would fall down on my chair.

I hope it would be the last time, because I’ve been well and happy in the last days.

entry.title: Headache-Free Day
entry.content:
First day ever, I don’t feel strange feeling “ache” in my head. So nice!

It’s just amazing how to feel healthy, simply no pain.

Happiest day of my life.

entry.title: Another Day With Tomapirin
entry.content:
Today is a little bit cold, it can be the snow that we had yesterday, more and less 5 degrees.

Strange enough, because it’s colder today, I don’t have strange feeling on my chest or heart, but I do have terrible headache right after I picked my little darling from Kindergarten.

So bad that I took another Tomapirin and thanks God, it is now gone.

But I really wonder when does thing like this end in my life?

Anyway, here is the pic I took from a hill behind our garden, it was beautiful and make me smile seeing this scenery.

entry.title: Another Weird Morning
entry.content:
This morning, like yesterday, I got my feet hurt like crazy, and feeling weird while making my own breakfast, felt like I would pass out, but I didn’t.

When I went to Kindi with my little darling, talked with another mom, she said, she feels the same, unwell, and want to pass out.

It could be the weather, which seems really crazy at the moment, yesterday was so warm, today is a little bit cold, etc.

Sigh, I wasn’t like this, also the age huh..

entry.title: New Doc Appointment
entry.content:
Today, another Doc’s appointment is done, though I doubt if I had to make it.

I am so glad that today I felt really well, slightly headache but not bad, but still wondered what it was yesterday.

Yesterday, my feet hurt like crazy, and both of them, and I felt something weird inside my chest. Can be heart failure sign, but my God, how pathetic I feel now, but it was something wrong, I felt VERY tired right in the morning immediately after I woke up, which was weird.

I got enought sleep, but weird both feet ache, and weird feeling in my heart or chest.

Before calling the doc, I thought, “will he believe what I will say or share to him what I am feeling or have been feeling?”

Because the doc will be my new “HausArzt” and I was in doubt if this doc will actually listen.

I need someone who can “listen” to me.

So appointment will be on March 10th.

Oh I went to shop, which is now a great stuff to do with this condition :(

entry.title: Tired After Baking One Cake?
entry.content:
I think I’ve never felt THAT tired today, I was questioning myself, what have I done?

I just baked one cake yesterday, and I am dead tired today, couldn’t even pick the cake’s plate up from Kindergarten kitchen.

It was once happened, I felt so tired but I forced myself to shop as I thought, I wasn’t going to die just because I feel tired.

But in the shop, I felt like I would fall. If I don’t have kids I would risk it. But my young kids need me, so I follow what my body says today, “don’t go”.

I just can’t believe that I am feeling so very tired just because baking ONE cake. Not normal afterall.

entry.title: Scratchy Head
entry.content:
My Phsychotherapist once told me, when I comb my hair, I should pull my hair out gently, and I do it too.

However, I sometimes feel like I have ants on my head, and it feels scratchy.

I often look myself at the mirror and focusing on my head skin if there is a blood shed or something like that because I scratched them often. But it didn’t then what it is?

I want to know what I am fighting..but it aint easy when you’re alone..

entry.title: Just One Tomapirin Today - Bliss
entry.content:
Couldn’t help it this morning, took Tomapirin and it helped. Baked the cake, finished it as I have to bring it there tomorrow morning, and felt the headache.

Attempted to take another Tomapirin, but thank God, it was gone all of sudden.

I don’t feel it right now, but I have the Radiologie CD result from the doc.

Still hoping it won’t be something to worry about.

Good night.

entry.title: Testing my New Git
entry.content: Let’s see if this works. Not much in front of it though.

entry.title: Insomnia or Just Stuffed Head
entry.content:
04:28 I was awake since 03:00, as always I was thinking right after I was awake, do I have headache now?, I didn’t.

But like now when I am in front of my terminal, I have a slightly headache, I am thinking, it’s my closed nose. Nothing to be worried about.

Then after an hour trying to sleep, I failed miserably.

It’s friday, will be a sort of hectic day, still going to bake a cake for “Kindi börse” for tomorrow.

It’s just the result of tugging my little darling in bed early – result of this insomnia or full-stuffed head.

Yeah, they will ask me, why are you too worried? you have healthy kids (which is true, and I am so thankful for) and loving husband..

When I am asked like this, I wish they knew how to be in my shoes. Good night/morning.

entry.title: A Must Hello World
entry.content: Another hello world post, if you’re listening.
